channel.title: Who would win in a fight
channel.description:
Batman or Iron Man?
IMO Batman
If you have any other hypothetical fights post them and get some feed back.

item.title: Who would win in a fight

so many nerds

internet.

item.title: Who would win in a fight
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:28, topic:441882”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=544558.msg3992351#msg3992351 date=1336770459]

Everyone knows that Jesus Christ our Savior and Lord Almighty wins the fight against all that intend to violate that which is Holy - Communism, Atheists, Muslims, Drugs and those who do not take Our Lord and Savior seriously - Thy Will be done!

I know your post is a troll but seriously shut up.
[/quote]
^^^^
This guy trying to silence the words of Jesus Christ. I will pray for you tonight.[/quote]
Hahhahhahahahhahaa, I’m not haha’ing at what you said but at something to do with you that I know will piss you off:). But lets leave it at that(:.

item.title: Who would win in a fight
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Steve from Minecraft might actually beet them all. I mean think about it, he’s able to carry a few thousand cubic meters of stone, metal, and minerals, get hit by arrows, get bit by zombies, blown up by penises, all while still being able to walk, jump, and run and STILL live in the end.

item.source: Who would win in a fight

item.title: Who would win in a fight
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:16, topic:441882”]Mr fantastic Vs Monkey D. Luffy

      My Guess: Monkey D. Luffy

Wolverine Vs Majin Buu

      My Guess: Majin Buu, though wolverine can heal idk  :confused:

4th Hokage vs Gol D. Roger

      My Guess: 4th Hokage, hes super fast and not alot about about roger is known yet.

Goku Vs Incredible Hulk

      My Guess: The Incredible Hulk, I could just see this fight destroying the earth, plus if we're talking comic book hulk hes near invincible.

Dracula Vs Uzumaki Naruto

      My Guess: Dracula, he is just immortal and doesn't sparkle, at least not yet.

Lothy Vs MoparIsTheBest

      My Guess: MoparIsTheBest, his grin is just too much.

Spiderman Vs Nex

      My Guess: Spiderman, he could just rip that thing a new one imo.

Giant Squid Vs Kraken

      My Guess: Giant Squid, more tentacles.

The Thing Vs Ganondorf

     My Guess: The Thing, idk why  :cool:

Samus Vs Megaman

      My Guess: Megaman

Bruce Lee Vs Chuck Norris, Super Mario & Pac-Man

      My Guess: [data corrupted][/quote]

Goku > everyone else on that chart tbh

Read full topic

item.title: Who would win in a fight
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:16, topic:441882”]Mr fantastic Vs Monkey D. Luffy

      My Guess: Monkey D. Luffy

Wolverine Vs Majin Buu

      My Guess: Majin Buu, though wolverine can heal idk  :confused:

4th Hokage vs Gol D. Roger

      My Guess: 4th Hokage, hes super fast and not alot about about roger is known yet.

Goku Vs Incredible Hulk

      My Guess: The Incredible Hulk, I could just see this fight destroying the earth, plus if we're talking comic book hulk hes near invincible.

Dracula Vs Uzumaki Naruto

      My Guess: Dracula, he is just immortal and doesn't sparkle, at least not yet.

Lothy Vs MoparIsTheBest

      My Guess: MoparIsTheBest, his grin is just too much.

Spiderman Vs Nex

      My Guess: Spiderman, he could just rip that thing a new one imo.

Giant Squid Vs Kraken

      My Guess: Giant Squid, more tentacles.

The Thing Vs Ganondorf

     My Guess: The Thing, idk why  :cool:

Samus Vs Megaman

      My Guess: Megaman

Bruce Lee Vs Chuck Norris, Super Mario & Pac-Man

      My Guess: [data corrupted][/quote]

1.Who?

2.Wolverine. I don’t know who the other guy is.

  1. Who?

  2. Goku can kamehahahamamam, so I’ll go with him.

  3. Dracula I guess.

  4. MITB

  5. Spiderman

  6. The thing is orange hulk right? I’ll go with the thing.

  7. Megaman.

  8. Bruce Lee trained Norris, so obviously he’ll win.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The Thing vs Hulk
IMO I think The Thing would win simply because he is solid rock. Rocks are tougher than muscle, although Hulk does rip tanks in half…

item.title: Who would win in a fight
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:16, topic:441882”]Mr fantastic Vs Monkey D. Luffy

      My Guess: Monkey D. Luffy

Wolverine Vs Majin Buu

      My Guess: Majin Buu, though wolverine can heal idk  :confused:

4th Hokage vs Gol D. Roger

      My Guess: 4th Hokage, hes super fast and not alot about about roger is known yet.

Goku Vs Incredible Hulk

      My Guess: The Incredible Hulk, I could just see this fight destroying the earth, plus if we're talking comic book hulk hes near invincible.

Dracula Vs Uzumaki Naruto

      My Guess: Dracula, he is just immortal and doesn't sparkle, at least not yet.

Lothy Vs MoparIsTheBest

      My Guess: MoparIsTheBest, his grin is just too much.

Spiderman Vs Nex

      My Guess: Spiderman, he could just rip that thing a new one imo.

Giant Squid Vs Kraken

      My Guess: Giant Squid, more tentacles.

The Thing Vs Ganondorf

     My Guess: The Thing, idk why  :cool:

Samus Vs Megaman

      My Guess: Megaman

Bruce Lee Vs Chuck Norris, Super Mario & Pac-Man

      My Guess: [data corrupted][/quote]
  1. agree
  2. wolverine can cut the fat, unless it’s the 3rd form, which can destroy almost the whole world
  3. Disagree, roger is equivalent to whitebeard, and whitebeard can destroy and create earthquakes and seaquakes which seems just so much better than just being fast. Whitebeard is known to be the strongest man in the world
    4.DISAGREE, HULK gets Hurt by jeeps thrown at him. Goku destroys planets
  4. don’t know
    6.agreed
  5. I don’t understand that debate, and is a stupid debate
  6. kraken. It’s a fucking legend and is god worthy beast. several thousands time larger than a giant squid Plus giant squids get sold in markets. Just dwarfs it. stupid debate and answer
  7. Don’t know much about both, I played ssb for ganondorf and watched fantastic 4 for the thing Terrible debate imo.
  8. Samus, She spins cooler, and she appears in 3d games more often. I like what’s underneath the suit better than megamans
  9. Bruce lee.

Read full topic
